results.name: a(n) = A002430(n) / A046990(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16385
program: \\ Quite wasteful, especially as there is the same bernfrac(2*n) in both. Should reduce to a much simpler form?
A002430(n) = numerator(((-1)^(n-1)) * 2^(2*n) * (2^(2*n)-1)*bernfrac(2*n)/((2*n)!)); \\ After _Johannes W. Meijer_'s May 24 2009 formula in A002430.

(MAGMA) [Numerator((-1)^(n - 1)*2^(2*n)*(2^(2*n) - 1)*Bernoulli(2*n) / Factorial(2*n)) / (Numerator(((-4)^n-(-16)^n) * Bernoulli(2*n) / 2 / n / Factorial(2*n))): n in [1..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 13 2019
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Apr 05 2004
